channel.title: Sense on Creating Value from Surprise, in a Post Bitcoin World.
channel.description: Recent content in Sense on Creating Value from Surprise, in a Post Bitcoin World.

item.title: Future Work
item.description: First things first. For previous work, please refer to the post on past work . I am also a to share with you is the AMA 21.co ARTS, CRAFTS AND UNEDITED THOUGHTS ON PAPER Notebooks I recently read The 21st Century Case For Gold: A New Information Theory Of Money by George Gilder and The DAO of Capital: Austrian Investing in a Distorted World by Mark Spitznagel, and I am currently reading Cents and Sensibility.
